replies.author: EterLzb
replies.txt_content:
Eternally_ 发表于 2016-6-30 13:46
打开那个插件的permissions.yml文件
删除以前的文字
把这段复制进去 ...
groups:
  default:
    permissions:
    - bukkit.broadcast.user
    - -bukkit.command.plugins
    - essentials.help
    - essentials.helpop
    - essentials.list
    - essentials.motd
    - essentials.rules
    - essentials.spawn
    - essentials.jail.allow.help
    - essentials.jail.allow.helpop
    - essentials.jail.allow.rules
  builder:
    inheritance:
    - default
    permissions:
    - essentials.build.*
